text:
Feb 13 is @MomsDemand Advocacy Day at the Texas Capitol, focusing on PREVENTING gun violence.

Looking for a signal boost from some high-profile Texans. Can you help and RT, please? @RoosterTeeth 

RSVP here:
https://t.co/LxchVCMj1X

tweets.text:
I spoke on the House floor for the victims of gun violence that we don’t always talk about. 

The mothers, the fathers who have suffered tragic loss - the voices that we don’t always hear. 

We need policy, we need change, and we cannot wait any longer. https://t.co/x0kPUtDqC2

It’s Friday, so call me crazy, but I can’t wait for next week. On Wednesday, our @HouseJudiciary Committee will have the first hearing on gun violence in 8 years. A new Congress is putting your right to be safe over any other rights. #EnoughIsEnough #HR8

This Gun Violence Survivors Week, survivors are sharing their stories on @Everytown’s #MomentsThatSurvive Memory Wall. Read this powerful story from Fred @fred_guttenberg, and then visit the Memory Wall to read other stories or share your own. https://t.co/ymRTlsJgnT
